variants.text:
Our Startup Pitch Contest is the centerpiece of the {{event_name}}. Selected startups will have the opportunity to pitch their innovations to a panel of experienced investors and industry leaders. Benefits include:

- Direct exposure to active investors in biotech
- Expert feedback from industry veterans
- Networking with fellow founders and potential partners
- Media coverage and visibility in the ecosystem
- Prize opportunities (details to be announced)
The event features a startup pitch contest where selected biotech companies present to investors and judges for a chance to win prizes and secure funding.

To participate in the pitch contest, simply submit your application at {{contest_url}}. We're looking for innovative biotech and synthetic biology startups at various stages. Selected companies will be notified by {{notification_date}}.
